subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This plugin allows you to define user profiles based on a set of roles and rights.
It thus facilitates the management of authorizations

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p: The configuration of profiles is done from the "Profile Management" submenu in the Back Office.
A profile is defined by an identifier and a description.
The configuration of a profile consists of assigning it:

ul.li: a view (dashboard of the Back Office home page)

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: Assigning a profile to a user automatically grants them the roles, rights, and work groups defined in the profile.
